about.name: Ciril Arockiaraj
about.comments: Motivated software developer with over 2+ years of hands-on experience in full-stack development. Skilled in building scalable, high-quality web and enterprise applications using modern technologies. My expertise covers frontend frameworks, backend architecture, and cloud deployment. I take pride in writing clean, efficient code and crafting seamless, user-centric digital experiences.

mainSkills.name: HTML
mainSkills.description: Proficient in writing semantic, standards-compliant HTML5 code optimized for accessibility and performance across modern browsers.

mainSkills.name: CSS
mainSkills.description: Skilled in crafting responsive and visually appealing layouts using CSS3, Flexbox, Grid, and modern animation techniques, including SCSS pre-processing.

mainSkills.name: JavaScript
mainSkills.description: Strong understanding of ES6+, asynchronous programming, DOM manipulation, and building dynamic interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks.

mainSkills.name: Java
mainSkills.description: Experienced in Java application development using OOP principles, Spring Boot framework, and building scalable enterprise-grade backends.

mainSkills.name: Guidewire
mainSkills.description: Hands-on experience with Guidewire PolicyCenter, including policy form patterns, entity configuration, and custom form inference logic.

mainSkills.name: Python
mainSkills.description: Proficient in Python for web applications, automation, and data-driven systems using frameworks such as Flask and Django.

experience.comments: Contributed to the development and maintenance of enterprise-grade applications using Guidewire, Spring Boot, Angular, React, and Python. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver robust, efficient, and scalable solutions.

projects.name: Guidewire policy center
projects.technologies: Gosu, entities, policy form patterns, custom form inference
projects.description: Engineered custom functionalities and configurations for the Guidewire PolicyCenter using Gosu programming and entity design, tailored to meet complex client-specific insurance workflows and data requirements.

projects.name: MuleSoft to SnapLogic Migration
projects.description: Developed a migration framework to convert MuleSoft workflows into SnapLogic pipelines using Angular and Spring Boot, enabling seamless API integration, transformation, and automated data migration.

projects.name: AI - Research
projects.technologies: Python, AWS Bedrock, Azure AI Foundry
projects.description: Built intelligent AI-driven applications leveraging LLMs and RAG architectures for data extraction, reasoning, and analysis using AWS Bedrock and Azure AI Foundry ecosystems.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in software engineering, data science, and advanced computing methodologies, focusing on real-world software development practices.
Gained a strong foundation in computer science principles, programming, and software design through practical projects and coursework.
